snippet: In the final days of one of the most painful seasons of his career, Red Sox Manager Bobby Valentine sustained minor injuries after falling from his bicycle while reading a text message.
abstract: Boston Red Sox manager Bobby Valentine sustains minor injuries after falling from his bicycle while reading a text message.
lead_paragraph: In the final days of one of the most painful seasons of his career, Red Sox Manager Bobby Valentine sustained minor injuries after falling from his bicycle while reading a text message.

headline.seo: Valentine Injured After Reading Text While Cycling
headline.main: Valentine Hurt After Reading Text Message on Bike
headline.print_headline: Valentine Is Hurt Falling Off Bike
